mapper.select: SELECT userid , password , username , Authority , Phone , Mobile , Email , Address , UseYN , IP , Mac , LastLogin , LoginYN , RegID , RegDate , UpdateID , UpdateDate FROM userinfo where useYN = 'Y'
mapper.update: Insert INTO userinfo (userid , password , username , Authority , Phone , Mobile , Email , Address , UseYN , IP , Mac , LastLogin , LoginYN , RegID , RegDate ) VALUES ( '${userid}' , '${password}' , '${username}' , '${authority}' , '${phone}' , '${mobile}' , '${email}' , '${address}' , '${useYN}' , '${IP}' , '${mac}' , '' , 'Y' , '${userid}' , getdate() );
mapper.delete: update userinfo set UseYN = 'N', updateID = '${regid}' WHERE userid='${UserID}'
